Info.Title: The Remaining
Info.Writer: Casey La Scala (screenplay), Chris Dowling (screenplay), Casey La Scala (story)
Info.Actors: Johnny Pacar, Shaun Sipos, Bryan Dechart, Alexa PenaVega
Info.Plot: Friends gather at a wedding, but the celebration is shattered by terrifying apocalyptic events forcing them to examine life, love and faith as they must choose between redemption and survival.
